H1.text: when did the age of new media began. The 1990s

H2.text: when did the age of new media began. The 1970s

H3.text: when did the age of new media began. the 1980s

A4.text: In the middle of the 1990s, the phrase 'new media' became widely used as part of a sales pitch for the influx of interactive CD-ROMs for entertainment and education.
